hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path of #gold#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #the Blue Fire Arrows# and #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found in #Goron City#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Underwater Left Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bow#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Mirror Shield#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #the Graveyard# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Jabu Jabu's Belly Compass#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Bongo Bongo# holds...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #a Strength Upgrade#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #1# major item.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #a Game Key# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #6# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Mirror Shield#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #0# major items.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #the Sun's Song#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Water Temple Small Key#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals #ReDeads# guarding a chest.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bow#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: Did you know that ReDead won't attack if you walk very slowly?

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Fire Temple Boss Key# can be found at #Zora's River#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# and #the Biggoron Sword#.

ToT (Right).text: I've heard Sploosh Kaboom is a tricky game.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #Ruto's Letter#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #the Stone of Agony#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a chest spawned by #Sun's Song#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a #fairy outside Ganon's Castle# holds #a Deku Stick#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Entrance Front Left Chest
